website_summaries.verdict: A healthy and all-natural moist little snack made with real chicken, which comes packed in a handy resealable 3-ounce bag.
pros: Perfect for both kittens and adult cats
Made with wholesome ingredients, such as chickpea flour and maple syrup
cons: Treats may get hard if bag is not resealed properly

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients, but I misread and thought these were crunchy treats. They are soft.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the package better. I assumed "Bubby Biscuits" were crunchy treats. I've been hunting for a healthier treat for my cat and the ingredients looked good for this product. Unfortunately my super picky girl won't eat soft treats, so I'll pass these on to her kitty cousin. She did give it a good smell and tested the texture by chewing one, so it must have been appealing otherwise, but she's very picky about texture and this didn't pass her chew test and she spit it out. If this brand sold crunchy treats though I would purchase those to try if the ingredients were like these ones. If your kitty likes soft/chewy treats, this should be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: BR_Massie

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: i don't trust any cat foods now that don't say the exact percentage of meat and clearly state what kind of meat you're getting. i am not crazy about the gelatin. or potato flour.. my cat likes them. but he also loves to eat things that make him sick, like potato chips. so i don't go by that any more. but he also loves the 98% raw new zealand cat food i recently tried. enough that i give that to him dry as a treat. its expensive, but i prefer it.
customer_reviews.author: nerd_up

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!
customer_reviews.text: I have a VERY picky fat cat - which makes no sense to me - but these are one of only two treats that he actually eats. They are small so he doesn't have a hard time chewing them and he loves the smell and taste. And I like that they are made from good ingredients and here in the US. Thanks for a great product
customer_reviews.author: Heather Paulocsak

customer_reviews.title: Solid cat treat without any stink. Cats like 'em but aren't fanatics.
customer_reviews.text: This is the chicken flavor. I was afraid they'd smell bad and be bad to handle, but they aren't- they hold together well and have a reasonably minimal smell. Our cats like them enough to be tempted with them, but won't bolt across the house to get one. I think I could find a treat they like more, but I have no complaints about this one, so it gets 5 stars overall from me. B-plus to A. More treats than I'd expected. Bag should last a little while. They're apparently still palatable after a few spilled ones have been left out overnight, which is a point in their favor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend Buddy Biscuits-- for cats or the dog ones for dogs in your life
customer_reviews.text: I have experience with the Buddy Biscuits brand with their products for dogs. My parents have fed Buddy Biscuits to their two dogs for years and they are both grain free (ie., loved by humans for their dogs) AND loved by dogs alike. So, I when I saw these Buddy Biscuits for cats, I was excited and knew they would be a high-quality product from my past experience with their dog biscuits. These are soft (but not overly moist and not at all wet) treats, about the size of a single pea or so. My cat LOVES them and gobbles them up when we shake the treat bag. I would certainly recommend them to others!
customer_reviews.author: Molly C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats with trouble chewing
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a soft treat that our toothless boy could eat, and would not upset his delicate tummy. These do the trick and he loves them! Also his name is Buddy... so, yeah, meant to be.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecoís

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned in the name. soft and chewy. these are both of those and small-sized. If this is what you cat wants then this is perfect. No Added Gluten, Wheat, Corn or Soy, so not "too" bad for your pet. Our cat lost interest and preferred the more hard and crunchy treats so that is why we did not repurchase. But all in all great product, if you cat likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Magoo

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves them nutritious and delicious-recommend them!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get my cat to lose weight but still have treats. We switched him to these soft treats. He loves them. Not sure if he's lost much weight yet, but he looks forward to these treats as much as the old ones which were not nearly as healthy!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: Got these on sale because why not. My cats love soft treats like these, mostly those meat stick treats, but really wasn’t confident they’d like the whole grain free healthy version of these. Upon first opening they went wild. Now every time I open the treat drawer my cat runs towards it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris94

customer_reviews.title: Great grain-free snack
customer_reviews.text: This a great product at a great price. I bought two bags for my cat to see if she likes them. She isn’t thrilled- maybe she has just been used to a crunchy snack- but they still get eaten. They don’t hurt her stomach and she doesn’t get diarrhea, so I’m happy! She’ll get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the tummy = happy kitty!
customer_reviews.text: Only treats my kitty can eat without throwing up afterwards. So excited to find these treats - my kitty can finally have treats without the worry of being sick after. He's thrilled to have a nightly treat now!
customer_reviews.author: A. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves Them - A+++
customer_reviews.text: My cat had major dental surgery about a year ago and had multiple teeth extracted. My vet assured me that he would have no issues chewing hard food but I try to make them as soft as possible so he can chew them up. He absolutely loves these! While he's not a picky eater by any stretch, he does love these and will pick them out first before coming back to the others. They're soft and not too smelly and I love that they are a relatively clean treat (ingredient wise) to give my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A Thurn

customer_reviews.title: Bengal and Savannah treats !
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality and the price for this quality is PERFECT! However......size......even my Bengals have trouble with these. They are round, and thick and slippery. Takes them a long time to eat and they will just not deal with it. I break it into 3 chunks and then they can tackle it. Past that, they all love them! But, all cats are different. For the price, you can afford to experiment. YES, i consistently buy them, they just require human intervention in my kingdom to work :) !
customer_reviews.author: lance bingham

customer_reviews.title: No one will eat them!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to give these to my 2 cats on separate occasions and neither of them even paid any mind. Not even hiding them in their regular food worked, they just avoided them like the plague. One sniff and they lost interest completely. I had this entire bag of treats my cats would not eat, so I let my friend take them for her cats. They didn't touch them either. So far like 5 different cats have been introduced to these and did not touch them. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: plainly

customer_reviews.title: wonderful ingredients
customer_reviews.text: my 16 year old cat Willow, loves these treats and goes into full purr mode while eating them. I like that I'm giving her a treat that is healthy and doesn't seem to irritate her sensitive stomach! My cat has a hard time digesting grains and corn products so, these treats are terrific!
customer_reviews.author: LD Shambach

customer_reviews.title: Picky Cat with Poultry Allergy Loves These
customer_reviews.text: My cat has unpredictable tastes when it comes to treats, even enjoying some for a few days and then completely avoiding them later. He loves these treats and I love that there is absolutely no poultry in them, which he is allergic to. Check labels -- most seafood "flavors" have poultry products as the first or second ingredient. Not these! They are also a nice soft texture and aren't stinky. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gingiss

customer_reviews.title: Older cat and all kittens love these!
customer_reviews.text: Grain free treats, moist, older picky cat and all the kittens love these! A huge hit! We only feed dry and wet grain free food for our kitties. Wanted to make sure the treats are equally as healthy! And made in the USA! I have the other 2 flavors, tuna and chicken on auto ship, wish these were as well! Will never get any other treats for the kitties!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: My Sr. cat's fav!
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat LOVES these treats! Usually he cannot have treats as they tend to cause him to throw up but not these. So glad I finally found soft treats he loves and doesn't upset his tummy.
customer_reviews.author: Diann Lee

customer_reviews.title: not the best nor the worst
customer_reviews.text: Decided to give these a try because I was looking for some healthier cat treats. One cat sniffed at them and wasn't interested. One took a piece into her mouth but spit it back out. I have two kittens and they eat them, but then they eat just about anything they find lying on the floor so that's not saying much.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Cat

customer_reviews.title: Maniac cat chews through everything to get to these
customer_reviews.text: The flavor must be outstanding because my cat has chewed through the packaging to get to these. He has also chewed through plastic baggies and when I put them in a harder plastic container I found toothmarks in that as well. So you could probably rate the flavor as 10 out of 5!
customer_reviews.author: S.L.W.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: We have one picky cat who does not like treats or wet cat food. She LOVES Buddy Biscuits! Shaking the packet will bring her out from her hiding place anytime!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: 3 cats love these Grain-Free soft treats!  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our senior cat that can't eat grains. She loves it, as does our other two cats without allergies. As a treat, the other two cats get these two. One knows how finicky cats can be, but ours love these and get them every evening.
customer_reviews.author: University DocTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Healthy cat treats.
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this stuff. It’s pretty clean in the ingredient list and isn’t high in empty calories. They come running when they hear the bag.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Kittens, Cats and Strays wont touch these treats.
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend these. My kitten wont even touch them. I gave them to my mombfor her 6 cats they won't touch them. So she has stays near her house so we put them out and they wouldn't touch them. They sat for 2 days so we threw them out. I thought they would be good for my kitten considering they are soft and sounds like good ingredients but nope!! If the strays WONT eat them I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer stevens

customer_reviews.title: Cheap treat did the trick. My cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very finicky. We bought this treat to entice her to climb to the top of the cat tree that we bought for her and it worked. She climbed to the very top to get her treat. Although other treats cost way more than this, my cat merely sniffed it and walked away. However this is the cheapest treat of all the treats we bought and she followed the smell all the way up to the top of the cat tree.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel White

customer_reviews.title: Grain free is best for cats since they are obligate carnivores
customer_reviews.text: Grain free is best for cats since they are obligate carnivores. Our cats no longer have bowel issues since going entirely grain free.
customer_reviews.author: Persia

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves them
customer_reviews.text: My little guy absolutely loves these things. The ingredients seem high quality and he would prefer I give him way more than I do. :) He seems a bit confused by the color/shape - if he misplaces it, it takes him a while to find it again. But once he does, it's gone in a second. Good for training, because they're low calorie!
customer_reviews.author: Paxton & Bevin

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: My 2 orange tabbies have tried many different grain-free treats and these are by FAR their favorite! They come running when they hear the bag being opened! They are soft and keep well, even after being opened (as long as you re-seal them).
customer_reviews.author: SDolan

customer_reviews.title: Two out of three of our cats like these
customer_reviews.text: These are much better for cats than some of the other treats out there. One of our three cats won't eat these but she was a rescue and lived on the streets for awhile so her tastebuds are warped. The other two gobble them down.
customer_reviews.author: Wade K.

customer_reviews.title: Picky cats love this healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: Picky cats in my home mostly ignore healthy treats, but not these Buddy Biscuits...cats love them. Vet recommends a grain free diet due to their health. I am so glad I found these. Small, soft, easy to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves them
customer_reviews.text: Buddy Biscuits are popular with my dog so I was happy to see they make cat treats too. My cat is very particular about treats but she absolutely loved these right away! I like that they’re gluten free.
customer_reviews.author: bee

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them and chicken-free!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and one of them is severely allergic to poultry. I thought finding poultry-free food was hard, try treats! So glad I saw these on an Instagram account and my cats love them. You don't get a lot so they don't get more than 2 when I give them as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Amra

customer_reviews.title: My kitties LOVE these treats
customer_reviews.text: My kitties LOVE these treats. They run to the cabinet begging for them if they know they are in there. Very happy and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charbbio

customer_reviews.title: These get hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a cat with bad teeth because they were supposed to be soft. They sat out overnight and the next morning were hard as a rock. Would not recommend for cats with teeth issues. Since the other cats didn't go after them, I guess they weren't very appealing ( I have 4 cats).
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Borolla

customer_reviews.title: Soft and chewy - great for older cats!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat doesn’t get excited about much but he goes crazy for these treats!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R

customer_reviews.title: My cat gobbles them right up!
customer_reviews.text: I chose and my cat liked them! Winner! Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these treats!
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes crazy for these treats! I like that they don't have a lot of garbage in them like many of the other kitty treats on the market. They smell amazing, like jerky or a meat stick. I've only tried the chicken flavor thus far but I imagine he'd love the salmon as well. These are the only kind I currently give him. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Renee D

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat throw up
customer_reviews.text: The first couple times my cat had a few of these, she threw up a few hours later. When I tried to give her some afterwards, she just won't eat them at all. Threw away the remaining packages.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Wagner

customer_reviews.title: My cat is very happy when it is treat time!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is fairly picky, but she goes bananas for these things. She's a creature of habit and relishes her treat time and lets me know if I forget to give her some of these.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kerwood

customer_reviews.title: They LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: I give these to my cats as a nightly treat. They LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Paine

customer_reviews.title: Neither cat will eat them
customer_reviews.text: I have two inside cats and neither one of them would eat these treats. Fortunately they won't have to be tossed as we have a few stray driveway cats who will be glad to take them off my hands.
customer_reviews.author: BELIEVESINMIRACLES

customer_reviews.title: Hard rubber like pellet cat treat.
customer_reviews.text: This brand trying to say it is all natural and grain free. The treats are like a hard piece of rubber. Cat cannot chew something that hard. Chew does not brake apart . Does not look like any type of food to me. Try braking one apart yourself. Do not buy this junk trying to say it is a high quality product. Had to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Kasperowicz

customer_reviews.title: My cat really liked it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat climbed on the shelf, knocked it on the floor, chewed a hole in it, and ate the entire bag’s content. All of this while I was sleeping one night.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My one cat loves them. Other cat won't even sniff them. Don't think they are worth the price per bag. I can get in store for about 2$ cheaper. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie J

customer_reviews.title: Moist, grain-free, & cats love them
customer_reviews.text: Grain-free, natural & nutritious cat treats and my picky cats love them. No by-products, cheap ingredients, tender, moist & good protein. I will definitely buy again to keep my kitties happy & healthy!
customer_reviews.author: RugbyGirl

customer_reviews.title: one cat loves them, the other doesn't
customer_reviews.text: One cat goes crazy for them, I have to hide the bag or she'd eat the entire thing in one go. The other turns his nose up at them and won't eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Matchgirl42

customer_reviews.title: Good treats for my cats
customer_reviews.text: Most of my cats like them but I DO have picky felines
customer_reviews.author: Sam5663

customer_reviews.title: Neither cat liked them.
customer_reviews.text: Look and smell vaguely playdough like, even the outdoor feral cat won't eat them oddly enough. <shrug> Won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: JBWB6504 Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes them
customer_reviews.text: Cat likes ‘em, they were cheap. Don’t smell terrible. Soft for kitty to chew. Cat doesn’t go crazy for these but he likes.
customer_reviews.author: MAW

customer_reviews.title: Favorite treats!
customer_reviews.text: These are my cats favorite!! I can actually train them with these!! Excellent value for the money and they’re healthy too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kelly

customer_reviews.title: They are well liked but will leave crumbs
customer_reviews.text: My cats liked them very well. I like that they were grain free. Our eldest cat is sensitive to grains.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: My cat did not like them
customer_reviews.text: My cat does not like these, but she is rather picky. She did eat them at first, but now turns her nosen up at them. They are a nice size and relatively soft, but apparently they are not stinky enough for her!
customer_reviews.author: AmyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My cats aren't finicky
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats, ages 9 months to 19 years. I like to give them grain free food. All 4 sniff these and walk away. They will eat some other treat brands. I've tried giving these treats at various times and it's the same response. I haven't tried other flavors of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: None of my five cats will eat these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would see the day that NONE OF MY FIVE CATS wouldn't eat what is supposed to be a cat treat!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer in TEXAS

customer_reviews.title: my cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Its not that I love it. It's that my cat loves it. She cannot have grains. Usually when a food is recalled, its because of the grains.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty Water Lady

customer_reviews.title: My cat says they’re DELISH YUM YUM
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find something a little different for my picky cat and she really likes these treats. They’re small treats but meaty, I’m glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: 💜 Sassy Pants 💜

customer_reviews.title: OHHH BOY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Flavor? Who tastes their cat's snacks? Silly review question. Neither of our cats like these snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Briscoe County

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to love?
customer_reviews.text: My cat, Shira, is allergic to grains. I went on a search for grain free treats and found Buddy Biscuits. Shira loves them. They don’t make her sick. No downsides. Thank you Buddy Biscuits.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My picky cat only eats royal canin or wet food would not touch these. To make it worse the resealable bag would not seal even after first opening it. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: Mope

customer_reviews.title: Cat crack
customer_reviews.text: Amazon screwed up my last order so my cat had to go a few days without any bribes...I forgot how easy these made my life...and of course they make my cat happy too :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CATS HATED IT!
customer_reviews.text: Not one of our inside or outside cats will eat these. Mixed them into food, broth, and they still will not eat. I finally got one feral to eat them after cutting into very tiny pieces and mixing with liver and chicken flavored food, but he would not eat the second time. Cannot give better rating...
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Not Cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: my babies did not like this. and they LOVE getting treats.
customer_reviews.author: E. McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Not for all cats
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my cat does not like them. She smells them and just turns away. I've also tried to just sneak them into her regular food and she eats around them.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey N.

customer_reviews.title: not a fan
customer_reviews.text: My cat did not like these treats, they are cheap in price, but they are round and rubbery my cat refused them.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: My cat approves of this cat treat, so it must be good. She really loves these buddy biscuits!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McNally

customer_reviews.title: Buddy biscuits!
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love these! Even one of them who is super picky about treats. They come in really cute packaging also, which just warms my heart. The price is a great deal for the quality of the product. Very affordable and very good! I always make sure that we’re stocked up on buddy biscuits!
customer_reviews.author: Kenia G.

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Approves
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these and I love that they work for his carnivorous diet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My cat had to have a kidney removed, so everything I give her needs some water content. These "biscuits" fit that bill. Kitty likes them, they are moist - and she has to chew them for some reason - unlike other treats. Another great feature: they fit beautifully in the cat treat ball she plays with. Not too hard to get out.
customer_reviews.author: vjnk

customer_reviews.title: No cheese please
customer_reviews.text: Ms Kitty Wells loves them all except for the turkey and cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Bookdragon

customer_reviews.title: CAT CANDY!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat with a grain allergy and he (and the other cat who doesn't have an allergy) loves these. Small and great for training treats.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Cloud Star Grain Free Cat Treats
customer_reviews.text: This product has good intentions and is meant to be healthier for cats, but my cats just look at me when I give them these, They don't like them. I didn't feel it would be appropriate giving three stars because I like the idea of my cats eating healthier, but they don't. Besides, my dogs really like them!
customer_reviews.author: tmcs

customer_reviews.title: Best cat treats ever
customer_reviews.text: My cat is crazy for these treats!!! They are her all time favorite.
customer_reviews.author: KreepyKeyanna

customer_reviews.title: Cat wouldn't touch them
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these, as I wanted a grain-free snack option for my cat. Unfortunately, he barely sniffed it when I put it in front of him and I'm not sure he even identified it as food, even though he did his trick. Maybe I will try integrating with other treats he likes to trick him. No return policy, so if it doesn't work, I'm stuck with these. I gave 2 stars because it's a good concept, just doesn't pan out.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: I liked the fact it's grain free, but my cats won't touch it...
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product, except my cats won't eat it. All three of them--and two are anything but picky eaters--sniff at it, and then walk away. My oldest, KatKat, eats just about anything put in front of her, including, but not limited to, broccoli, pasta, and donuts (no, I don't give her donuts; she waits for me to not pay attention so she can swipe a morsel from my plate!)...so, even KatKat won't eat these. I'm a bit disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Grinnell

customer_reviews.title: Good for her
customer_reviews.text: You know my cat can't read because she would never get so exited about these treats otherwise. Instead, she comes running if I so much as move the canvas tote I keep the treats in. Shush, let's not tell her they are better for her than the big brand treats! If she knew she'd turn her pretty pink nose up at them.
customer_reviews.author: Cici-online

customer_reviews.title: Better treats for your fur baby
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves these and I love that they are all natural
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: My cats do no approve of
customer_reviews.text: My cats are not fans of these. They do not seem very soft either. My dogs like them though:)
customer_reviews.author: Can

customer_reviews.title: Best cat treats awesome price
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my cats favorite treats! And the price is my favorite part!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wrona

customer_reviews.title: A winner.
customer_reviews.text: Cats love them. Sent these with the sitter I hired and now she is their new best friend. (Traitors.) These two particular cats can be somewhat finicky. So while I haven't tasted them myself, they must taste pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Ambra

customer_reviews.title: My cats favorite treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these. Keep in pouch sealed to stay soft.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Kittyyyy
customer_reviews.text: When I tasted them they were alright. But my wife got them for me to feed to kitties when I’m out working.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas & Holly

customer_reviews.title: My cats do not prefer this
customer_reviews.text: Weird texture, reminds me of that wax ring that goes under toilets. Smells like soysauce. My cats usually go crazy over treats, I wanted to try something healthier and grain-free, they just smell it and walk away. I has to toss in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: cats like it
customer_reviews.text: my cats like it. It is only for a special treat, tho.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Moon

customer_reviews.title: I like that this are good for my little fluff balls
customer_reviews.text: I like that this are good for my little fluff balls... but... one of my cats won't touch them. Oh well... she's a little chunky anyway.
customer_reviews.author: 7CentCricket

customer_reviews.title: Success
customer_reviews.text: Cats like them. I was worried because I have bought some brands in the past and they were not well received.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Neither cat even interested..
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1 1/2 year old cat and a 13 1/2 yr old and they both stuck their noses up at this treat. There is a nice amount in the package and it cost very little. Sounds like it would be a healthy treat so I suppose if your cat likes it, its good value for your money. Mine didn't! My cousin will feed it to her dog, lol Good Luck!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Walker

customer_reviews.title: Cat seems to like them
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes them so much that he knocked them off the shelf they were on and ripped the bag open while I was at work!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Coffelt

customer_reviews.title: They LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: i give these as nightly treats to my cats. They LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Paine

customer_reviews.title: My cats liked these so much I already ordered more.
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats really like these treats, I have already ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Lyne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes not my cats
customer_reviews.text: Cats didn’t like gave to dogs. Dogs usually like everything.
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these treats
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my cats love these treats and I love how healthy they are
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loved them but got stale
customer_reviews.text: Kitty loved them but they got too hard for her to chew after a while. Make sure you seal the bag tight each time to prevent this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At Likes Them
customer_reviews.text: Cat likes them, so what more can I say, or needs to be said.
customer_reviews.author: P. Howard

customer_reviews.title: My cat hates treats.
customer_reviews.text: These are no different. My cat looks at these niblets like they're Soylent Green.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grain free treats for yours kitts..
customer_reviews.text: These treats are great grain free treats for your kitts. My oldest cat loves em. My younger cat doesn't seem to fancy them, but I think it's because she doesn't like the tempting tuna flavor since she also doesn't like blue buffalo kitty yums tempting tuna either. I will try chicken next time though, because she does like blue buffalo wilderness chicken grain free.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: Great treats. Cats beg for them.
customer_reviews.text: I needed my cats to have gluten free treats for me since I can't touch gluten without somehow getting cross contaminated. My cats LOVES these!!!
customer_reviews.author: LaurieD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was my 1st time I ordered, the bits were hard, and difficult to chew with both my cats, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients, but your mileage may vary
customer_reviews.text: Good that these are grain-free, but of our cats only 1 out of 3 really took to these (i.e. the greedy one). So, your mileage may vary depending on how finicky your cats are...
customer_reviews.author: EricY

customer_reviews.title: My two cats love these, and find the bag on the counter ...
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love these, and find the bag on the counter to encourage me to give them treats!!! I can rattle the bag from anywhere in my house and my kitties come running!!! My third cat does not like them, and won't even try them. I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: My cat won't eat them. They also dry up ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat won't eat them. They also dry up quickly even if you keep the pouch sealed. Store them in a glass jar if you have luck with your cat eating them. Then they will stay fresh.
customer_reviews.author: library lady

product_meta.title: Buddy Biscuits Grain Free Cat Treats, Soft & Chewy, No Added Gluten, Wheat, Corn or Soy
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:3 oz.We say healthy cat treats are a win-win — your cat loves the straightforward, meaty flavor and you love knowing you're giving your cat the absolute best. Buddy Biscuits grain free cat treats with natural chicken are made with premium meats, and feature chicken as the first ingredient. Buddy Biscuits are soft texture cat treats that come in a resealable bag to keep each morsel chewy and soft. Great as kitten treats or cat snacks for aging cats. Completely grain free cat treats with no added gluten. – Wholesome cat treats made with high-quality ingredients – Soft texture cat treats, great for kittens, senior cats, or those that prefer less crunch – Grain free cat treats mean more healthy stuff with no nonsense – Contain no added corn, wheat, soy, artificial flavors, colors and by-products – Baked in the USA and packed in a resealable bag to lock in freshness and flavor
feature_bullets: Age Range Description: All Life Stages
Made with Premium Meats and Vegetables
No Corn, Wheat, Soy, or Eggs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
